trans-unit.source: Contains information about a part of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> at a specified coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni relative a una parte dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> in corrispondenza di una coordinata specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> class, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> is used to determine which part of an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, insieme al metodo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.HitTest%2A> del controllo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, viene utilizzata per determinare la parte di un controllo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> su cui l'utente ha fatto clic.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> class contains the location and associated designer that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contiene la posizione e la finestra di progettazione associata su cui l'utente ha fatto clic.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associato.

trans-unit.source: The location on the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Posizione sull'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associato su cui l'utente ha fatto clic.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associato alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associato alla classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property stores a reference to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: La propriet√† <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.AssociatedDesigner%2A> archivia un riferimento all'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associato all'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> to reference extended information about the designer associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> per fare riferimento a informazioni estese relative alla finestra di progettazione associata a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds of the area hit.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i limiti dell'area sottoposta a hit test.

trans-unit.source: A rectangle that encloses the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object or an empty rectangle if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object is not associated with a designer.
trans-unit.target: Un rettangolo che racchiude l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> o un rettangolo vuoto se l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> non √® associato a una finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The bounds will describe the area on the screen that was hit, usually the area that encloses the associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: I limiti descriveranno l'area sullo schermo sottoposta a hit test che, in genere, corrisponde all'area che racchiude l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> associato.

trans-unit.source: Contains information about where the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni relative alla posizione in cui si √® verificato l'hit test.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> that describes the area hit.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestLocations" /> che descrive l'area sottoposta a hit test.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.HitLocation%2A> to determine on what area of the designer the hit occurred.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.HitLocation%2A> per determinare l'area della finestra di progettazione in cui si √® verificato l'hit test.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the hit designer.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice della finestra di progettazione sottoposta a hit test.

trans-unit.source: The index of the designer hit by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Indice della finestra di progettazione sottoposta a hit test da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the value returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.MapToIndex%2A> to determine which designer was hit.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il valore restituito da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.MapToIndex%2A> per determinare la finestra di progettazione sottoposta a hit test.

trans-unit.source: This is useful for insertion or deletion operations.
trans-unit.target: Ci√≤ risulta utile per le operazioni di inserimento o eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets an empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> vuoto.

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> vuoto.

trans-unit.source: Use `Nowhere` to get an empty <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare `Nowhere` per ottenere un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> vuoto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto selezionabile associato all'area di hit test.

trans-unit.source: A selectable object associated with the hit area or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no designer is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto selezionabile associato all'area di hit test o un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) se all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> non √® associata alcuna finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Use `SelectableObject` to get the selectable object associated with the hit area.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare `SelectableObject` per ottenere l'oggetto selezionabile associato all'area di hit test.

trans-unit.source: If a designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> will return the activity associated with the designer, or null reference (`Nothing`) if no designer is associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Se una finestra di progettazione √® associata a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.SelectableObject%2A> restituir√† l'attivit√† ad essa associata o un riferimento null (`Nothing`) se a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> non sono associate finestre di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i dati utente associati a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A new dictionary for user data, or a reference to the existing user data.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo dizionario per i dati utente o un riferimento ai dati utente esistenti.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> to store user information about the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> per archiviare informazioni utente relative a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>.

trans-unit.source: If no user data has been stored, calling <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> creates a new, empty dictionary for use.
trans-unit.target: Se non sono stati archiviati dati utente, la chiamata alla propriet√† <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo.UserData%2A> determina la creazione di un nuovo dizionario vuoto da utilizzare.
